name: Finger's Fart
description:
You smell so good... Description

Want to make the "pull my finger" joke to your friend, but afraid of covid-19 ? Try this, bitch, and send it to your best friend.

It contains many fart sounds and they are all different made possible by my new innovative random pitch system.

How to contribute

If you want to contribute to this project, you can send me in a comment a google drive link containing your own fart sounds, and I will integrate them in my game.

Your nickname will be in the credits lol.

Controls

Press the fucking left click on your fucking mouse and pull the fucking finger !
